tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE errors_healthcare_robotic_procedures (
	event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
	event_type VARCHAR,
	event_description TEXT,
	event_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
	event_location VARCHAR
)

CREATE TABLE AdverseEvents (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_name VARCHAR(255),
    event_date DATE,
    event_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE AdverseEvents (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_date DATE,
    patient_id INT,
    error_type VARCHAR(50),
    error_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE RoboticProcedures (
    procedure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    procedure_date DATE,
    patient_id INT,
    doctor_id INT,
    procedure_type VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE ErrorReports (
    report_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_id INT,
    reported_by VARCHAR(50),
    report_date DATE,
    report_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE QualityImprovement (
    improvement_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    report_id INT,
    improvement_type VARCHAR(50),
    improvement_date DATE,
    improvement_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE adverse_events (
    event_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    event_date DATE,
    event_description TEXT,
    patient_id INT,
    robot_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE error_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    log_date TIMESTAMP,
    error_type VARCHAR(50),
    error_description TEXT,
    event_id INT,
    robot_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE robotic_procedures (
    procedure_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    procedure_name VARCHAR(100),
    procedure_date DATE,
    patient_id INT,
    robot_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE robots (
    robot_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    robot_name VARCHAR(50),
    robot_model VARCHAR(50),
    robot_vendor VARCHAR(50),
    robot_type VARCHAR(50)
);
